column2: Darwin Public School  (https://www.darwinschool.com/), is fast growing to be one of Chennais leading schools. A new age education institution, Darwin Public School believes in holistic education that will not only nurture a childs academic capability, but also hone extra-curricular and life-skills. Darwin Public School presently offers Montessori- and ICSE-based curriculum from Grade I to Grade VII. Inviting applications from  women candidates based in Chennai for the position of Coding Instructor (full time) at our campus in Puthagaram. The role will encompass: Impart coding sessions to students using engaging, interactive and fun methods.  Create interesting sessions that will inspire students to learn coding.  Foster creativity, critical thinking and problem-solving skills through hands-on coding activities, projects, and challenges. Make the coding classes understandable and relatable for young minds.  Create a positive and inclusive classroom atmosphere that encourages collaboration, teamwork, and respect among students. Assess content and delivery of the programs, evaluate student progress, take constructive feedback and devise methods to make teaching more effective.  Work with the school management to identity new teaching methodologies and coding technologies to be included in the sessions. Stay updated on the latest trends, tools, and resources in coding education, continuously improving teaching methods and curriculum content. Requirement: 1. A graduate/post graduate in computer science or coding background, with passion for teaching. 2. Prior experience as a coding tutor or instructor for young children is a must.  3. Good English communication skills  oral and written. Ability to speak clearly using vocabulary that children can easily understand.  4. Quick learner with a curious mind, enthusiastic with a calm demeanor to handle young children.

column2: WINMORE ACADEMY is looking for Pre-Primary Mother Teacher, Associate Teachers to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      We are seeking a dedicated and nurturing Pre-Primary Teacher to join our school      As a Pre-Primary Teacher, you will play a fundamental role in fostering the early development and education of young children      You will create a safe and stimulating learning environment, facilitate age-appropriate activities, and promote social, emotional, cognitive, and physical development        Key Responsibilities:        Curriculum Development: Develop and implement a developmentally appropriate curriculum for pre-primary children, including lesson plans, learning materials, and activities      Ensure alignment with educational standards and objectives      Foster a love for learning and encourage curiosity, creativity, and critical thinking skills      Classroom Management: Establish and maintain a well-organized and child-friendly classroom environment      Manage classroom routines, transitions, and behavior, promoting a positive and inclusive atmosphere      Set clear expectations and enforce classroom rules and boundaries      Foster a sense of community and respect among students      Individualized Instruction: Assess each child's developmental needs and learning styles      Adapt teaching strategies and materials to accommodate diverse abilities and learning profiles      Provide individualized attention and support to students, addressing their specific needs and challenges      Learning Support: Create a supportive and inclusive learning environment that encourages active student participation      Provide guidance and assistance to students in their learning activities      Foster language and communication skills, early literacy, numeracy, and motor skills development through engaging and interactive lessons and activities      Parent Communication: Establish and maintain open and regular communication with parents or guardians      Provide updates on children's progress, milestones, and areas of development      Conduct parent-teacher conferences and participate in parent involvement activities and events      Classroom Resources and Materials: Select and organize age-appropriate educational resources, materials, and equipment to enhance the learning experience      Create and display visual aids, learning centers, and interactive displays that promote student engagement and learning      Safety and Well-being: Ensure the safety and well-being of all students at all times      Follow proper safety protocols and emergency procedures      Monitor students during classroom activities and outdoor play      Attend to students' personal needs, such as toileting, feeding, and rest periods, as required      Professional Development: Stay updated on current trends, research, and best practices in early childhood education      Attend professional development workshops, conferences, and training sessions to enhance teaching skills and knowledge      Collaborate with colleagues and participate in team meetings and professional learning communities      Qualifications and Requirements:Bachelor's degree in Early Childhood Education or a related field (or equivalent certification/diploma in Early Childhood Education)      Relevant teaching certification or licensure, if required by the local education authority      Proven experience working with young children in a pre-primary or early childhood education setting      Strong knowledge of child development principles and early learning methodologies      Understanding of age-appropriate teaching strategies, techniques, and best practices      Excellent interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to connect and engage with young children and their parents      Patience, empathy, and a genuine passion for working with young children      Creativity and the ability to develop engaging and interactive learning activities      Strong organizational and classroom management skills      Knowledge of health and safety regulations and protocols in an educational setting      Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment      Proficiency in basic computer skills and educational technology is a plus

column2: About Infinity Learn Infinity Learn, backed by Sri Chaitanya Education Group, is transforming the digital learning landscape.Driven by a digital-first approach and led by industry-leading talent, we are on a mission to impact every learner's life positively. Our products are focused on supporting K-12 students in building temperament and skills for test prep for JEE, NEET, Foundation courses, etc.Website: https://infinitylearn.com Watch our story on Disney Hotstar:https://tinyurl.com/8ee8p2sv Position Title : Coding and Robotics Instructor Employment type : Full Time Work Location : Client Location  Schools Reports to : Account Manager, Principal of the school deployed. Position Overview: As a Coding and Robotics instructor, you are a highly committed and enthusiastic educator who would join our B2B team. As a Coding and Robotics instructor, you will have the opportunity to gain hands-on experience in Robotics, coding, and application of conversational AI. You will work closely with our product and delivery teams to support pre-sales activities and deliver compelling product demonstrations to potential stakeholders. You will be responsible for effective and timely session delivery at your designated school(s) and ensure effective learning outcomes of the students with learner centric approach. You are a motivator, and you mentor the young learners towards achieving best out of themselves in various competitions, exhibitions, demonstration of skills learnt. You are responsible for timely and effective communication between internal and external stakeholders. Preferred Qualification: B.E/ B.Tech (CS/ IT/ECE/ EEE/ E&I)/ MCA/ BCA / B.SC. / MSc.  Computer Science or Electronics Candidates with B. ED or M. ED will have added advantage Familiarity of programming languages like C, Python, WebApp development (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) Understanding of basic Electronics hardware like Input/ Output devices like sensors, actuators etc. Understanding of Microprocessors/ Microcontrollers architecture with basic programming on the devices Basic understanding of computer applications Must have Laptop with internet connectivity

column2: JOB DESCRIPTION EDUCATION FACILITATOR / ASSISTANT TEACHER   About Us Established in 2004, we are a chain of schools offering national and international curriculums across 36 schools pan India. With our well-researched curriculum, modern teaching methodologies and wide range of extra-curricular activities and facilities we constantly strive to enthuse our students with fascinating learning experiences every single day.   Role Education Facilitator  Pre-Primary/Primary   Department Pre-Primary/Primary   Designation Education Facilitator  Pre-Primary/Primary   Band and Grade E1   Location School   Reporting to Co-coordinator  Pre-Primary/Primary   Primary Purpose Responsible for preparing and implementing a full educational teaching plan according to the school's requirements .   Key Responsibilities Academic Operations: Should promote maximum student participation by assisting students in analyzing and improving methods and habits of study. Monitor physical setup and ensure maintenance of the classroom area.  Should be accountable for timely and orderly arrangement in the classroom.  Student Administration: Must supervise students outside of the classroom, such as between classes, during lunch and recess, and on field trips and School activities etc.  Accompany and supervise SPA activities Should inculcate discipline in and out of the classroom. Should Identify students with special needs and communicate to the Main Teacher. Administration Operations: Should assist the main teacher with work overflow. Should participate in organizing and implementing special events, field trips, culminating activities, PTMS of the school Work Relations:  Must report to the Main Teacher / Co-Coordinator for all functional as well as administration issues. Should interact with the principal about academic matters in relation to any issues concerning people/ operations, interface with Admin, Finance, HR, and Technical team.   Desired Qualification 12th pass/ Graduate in any field   Experience Fresher Or Minimum 1-2 years of experience in Preschools/Elementary grades    Expected Competencies Compassion and patience Problem solver Proactive, ethical, and responsible nature Creative & innovative Cool tempered, friendly and reliable Multi Tasker Interpersonal Skills Collaboration Optimizing work processes Effective Communication skills   Skills and Knowledge Excellent understanding of the principles of child development and preschool educational methods. Ability to act as mediator between children. Familiarity with safety and sanitation guidelines for classrooms. Share your resume at anindita.ganguly@vgos.org or watsa app on 7795080298

column2: Fleck is looking for Ecommerce Operation Executive to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      A Sales Support professional plays a vital role in assisting the sales team with various administrative and operational tasks to ensure efficient and effective sales operations      They provide crucial support to sales representatives and contribute to the overall success of the sales function      Here is a general job description for a Sales Support role:        Responsibilities:        Sales Administration: Assist with sales administrative tasks such as preparing sales reports, maintaining customer databases, updating sales documentation, and managing sales contracts or agreements      Order Processing: Process sales orders received from customers, ensuring accuracy and timeliness      Coordinate with various departments, including logistics and finance, to facilitate order fulfillment and timely delivery      Customer Communication: Interact with customers via phone, email, or in-person to address inquiries, provide product information, resolve issues, and assist with order status updates      Maintain positive and professional customer relationships      Sales Data Analysis: Analyze sales data, including sales reports, customer feedback, and market trends, to identify opportunities for sales growth or improvement      Provide insights and recommendations to the sales team based on data analysis      Sales Support Materials: Assist in the creation and maintenance of sales support materials such as presentations, product catalogs, sales collateral, and training materials      Ensure these materials are up to date and readily accessible to the sales team      Sales Pipeline Management: Help manage the sales pipeline by tracking and updating leads, opportunities, and sales activities in CRM (Customer Relationship Management) systems      Provide regular updates to the sales team regarding the status of leads and opportunities      Sales Team Coordination: Collaborate with the sales team to coordinate meetings, sales events, and presentations      Assist in the preparation of sales proposals, contracts, and sales presentations      Sales Reporting and Forecasting: Prepare and maintain sales reports, performance dashboards, and sales forecasting documents      Provide accurate and timely sales data and analysis to support decision-making and planning      Product Knowledge: Develop a solid understanding of the company's products or services, features, benefits, and competitive advantages      Stay updated with product updates, industry trends, and market dynamics to effectively support sales efforts      Process Improvement: Identify opportunities for process improvement and automation within the sales support function      Propose and implement solutions to enhance sales support efficiency, accuracy, and customer satisfaction      Skills and Qualifications:Strong organizational and administrative skills      Excellent written and verbal communication skills      Attention to detail and accuracy in data entry and record-keeping      Proficiency in using CRM software and Microsoft Office applications      Ability to multitask and prioritize tasks effectively      Customer-focused approach and ability to build positive relationships      Analytical and problem-solving skills      Team player with the ability to collaborate and work well with cross-functional teams      Sales or customer service experience is a plus      Knowledge of sales processes and principles is beneficial
